lender.name: Gord and Edna
lender.loan_because: Sometimes, people just need a helping hand!

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: Lend a little and have fun doing it.......

lender.name: Adine
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have memory diseases of the brain, like Alzheimer's Disease. I work with the patient, and their family.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy watching other people be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: Being an American, I often take for granted the many opportunities I am given, just simply by living in this part of the world. Everyone in the world deserves the same opportunities to be successful, healthy and happy in their own lives.

lender.name: Tom & Joy
lender.loan_because:
Life has been good to us and we like to assist and share with others. We feel that our loans give enterprising people the chance to improve their lot in life and build a future for themselves and their families. We believe that this is a most positive way to help impoverished people and areas.
From another viewpoint, given the minuscule interest on idle money, it really costs very little.
lender.occupational_info: Tom - Retired geologist but accepting occasional projects in earth sciences, energy, and minerals.. Joy- Retired music teacher occasionally substituting as church organist. Both - Extensive volunteer activity tutoring disadvantaged young adults and working in local public library bookstore

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Matthew 5-7

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the gifts that come to all of us from world cultures and traditional arts.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a bank branch for a local community bank.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: it just good to lend a helping hand to another.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance as a tool to alleviate world poverty.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed
lender.occupational_info: I invent things that solve problems

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone has the ability to make a difference even if it is one small step at a time!

lender.name: Miller Family
lender.loan_because: we like to help other people be successful.

lender.name: Victor
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for Christmas by a co-worker. She was very excited to get me involved in the Kiva experence. After looking through the possible recipientsI began to get excited too. I believe I am going to enjoy the experence too.
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who are addicted to drugs and alcohol and try to guide them to a better life.

lender.name: Eric Mucklow
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I look for ways to design and construct buildings to have the same or better quality and functionality, but use less energy and resources over the life of building.

lender.name: Lana
lender.loan_because: My dear friend introduced me to Kiva and these people working hard to improve their lives have stolen my heart.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a busy office at a College. I help families investigating college for their children.

lender.name: Pearl
lender.loan_because: So little can make a huge difference. Kiva makes it easy to donate and to keep donating.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It seems a good way to be charitable. You can not only see the direct impact your money has made but it's also encouraging people to try and build something sustainable.

lender.name: Cubby
lender.occupational_info: I rescue boxers in Dallas, TX.

lender.name: Missy
lender.loan_because: I am blessed many times over.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: those who want to be helped and are doing all they can, deserve our support.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach college age Americans about the world and global environmental challenges.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to live well and do what they love
lender.occupational_info: my passion is post-disaster and post-conflict urban regeneration. Helping to rebuild and recreate communities that have been jarred and disjointed by disasters natural or man-made.

lender.name: erin
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and take care of my toddler daughter, Ella.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I see all of the things that my family has that we take for granted. These people just want to send their children to school and pay their bills.

lender.name: karen
lender.loan_because: If people are willing to take a chance by asking for a loan to better or change their lives then I am willing to take a chance in fullfillling this request.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that operates schools which teaches people how to cook.

lender.name: Harry
lender.loan_because: I can, and to help others.

lender.name: John-Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are eager to better themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in leasing and sell ing retail stores, offices, warehouses and residential buildings.

lender.name: Mr BizPlan
lender.loan_because: I help people here in the US start businesses as my full time job. I do my job because I love seeing new entrepreneurs fulfill their dreams. Kiva.org gives me another way that I can help entrepreneurs world wide that need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I am an SBDC consultant in Fargo, ND. I am also a college professor for the University of Mary. In addition, I own a pizza restaurant and a small business website http://www.diybizplan.com. I love entrepreneurship and more so...I love entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Doctor Daigle
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed/fortunate and feel that it is my responsibility to spread the wealth.

lender.name: Seth and Kelly
lender.loan_because: With what little we can loan can not only build a community but someday help build an entire country.

lender.name: Mike Balotti
lender.loan_because: i believe in supporting those who have drive and supporting those who need a start.
lender.occupational_info: We have an organization that assists troubled adolescents, and helps them to find a new and healthier path.

lender.name: Alaina
lender.loan_because: I grew up under the poverty level and was helped by others in order to get a successful career. I want to be able to do the same for women around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am the go-between for the business side and the technology side to ensure that each understands each other and each others needs.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to the world in a tangible and hopefully successful way to say thank you to my parents for all that they have given me.

lender.name: Jack (and Mama and Dad)
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: When you reap the harvest of your land, do not reap to the very edges of your field or gather the gleanings of your harvest. Leave them for the poor and the alien. I am the LORD your God (Leviticus 23:22)

lender.name: Sheldon
lender.loan_because:
I like being connected to people around the world.
It is hard to contribute to communities as you travel and KIVA is an efficient way to assist people in places I briefly visit or regions I only can dream of traveling to.
I love to see people starting new businesses and sharing the entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help people build companies that can grow very large. My day job is managing financial and operational risk for a geotechnical engineering company.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: We have so much in Canada and we need to spread it around and help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Hairdresser/Psychologist (hahaha)

lender.name: JamieB
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to improve their life and their world. I am answering the knock of opportunity in my world to help others do the same in their's.
lender.occupational_info: I help computer programmers create better computer programs.

lender.name: Wallace Family
lender.loan_because: When we each do a little, a lot gets done...
lender.occupational_info: Our family was always taught to reach out and help.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a dream and work toward it with determination. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help to run a non-profit resale store to raise money which is donated to animal welfare (Humane Society) in my community.

lender.name: sonoko
lender.loan_because: i'm very privileged to have education and opportunities thanks to being born in the US, and i especially enjoy helping other women. it's the right thing to do and very gratifying to be a small part of making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: i work for a computer maintenance company, and manage the department that handles all billing, price quotes, and contracts.

lender.name: Justin and Dominique
lender.occupation: Senior Manager Online Operations and Sales
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help out in other countries, to see who you are helping and to give back a little something since we have been given so much.
lender.occupational_info: Help people make smart choices!

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Others helped me move from poverty and it's nice to pay it forward. And at $25 a loan, it's cheaper than therapy or a bad boyfriend! (Definitely much cheaper than the latter!)
lender.occupational_info: I'm a management & research consultant who is technically educated (MA) but find my greatest skills are ones I was born with: curious, helpful and flexible.

lender.name: CORA-Kiva
lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Our company makes drugs to meet serious unmet medical needs.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: The KIVA concept is just incredible. I can give/loan money to people who DESERVE it and because of their geographic & economic arenas, my dollars can do so much more.
lender.occupational_info: I assist patients with their pulmonary needs

lender.name: S.K.S. Khalsa
lender.loan_because: I am a fellow human being and I am fortunate to have some money that I can loan. I am so sad that banking systems around the world are instruments of injustice rather than empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids with learning, emotional and social difficulties.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I want to help wherever I can.

lender.name: Mike Macadaan
lender.loan_because: Given that entrepreneurship is a big component to what we're doing at Twiistup, Kiva is an obvious fit. We're partnering up with Kiva.org because we're big-big fans of what they're doing.
lender.occupational_info: Twiistup is an organization dedicated to giving attention to entrepreneurs and startups. The attention that we can provide at our events and on our website will result in connections that can help with funding, recruitment and like-minded community building.

lender.name: Students of bsappong
lender.loan_because: It works!!!

lender.name: chloe's family
lender.loan_because: we want to teach our daughter the importance of sharing with those in need. it is a value she can carry with her through her whole life.

lender.name: Dan & Lauren
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help people in a longer-term way by giving them the means to create financial stability for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: To help others to grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: Service Industry

lender.name: Matt Calcara
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place, one small business at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Digital Strategy Production = soooo, how should we do this whole website thing?

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I'm extremely fortunate to have the life I lead. I believe the best way to show appreciate for what I have is to help someone else gain a chance in life
lender.occupational_info: I develop fabric and the washes--the "look" that go on blue jeans.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I would like to help hard-working people. The expense of starting a business can stop many good ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I used to work in banking and in business planning. I live in a small house next to the ocean and near a mountain. My husband and I go hiking every day on the mountain.

lender.name: Don and Cara
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Rhona & Kathy
lender.loan_because: it's a way to directly impact someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I am capable to and I feel the need to give back.

lender.name: Mandy
lender.loan_because: It's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer, a songwriter, a painter and a jewelry maker.

lender.name: Avitania and Chad
lender.occupational_info: Avitania is a Marketing Program Manager for a retail website. Chad is an investor and salesforce recruiter.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: God tells us to give to those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a tradesman in the construction industry, I install fire sprinkler systems to protect people and property.

lender.name: World Centric
lender.loan_because: Because we believe in social economic justice
lender.occupational_info: World Centric is non-profit organization working to reduce economic injustice and environmental degradation through education, community networks & sustainable enterprises.

lender.name: Shirani
lender.occupation: Parent of student in Mr. Burcham\'s Class

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: I feel as though the development of localized entrepreneurship is the healthiest and most likely successfull solution to a strategic combat of poverty abroad.
lender.occupational_info: I am a highschool student, who part-times working in a steel-rule die shop.

lender.name: Malcolm
lender.loan_because: It is important that we assist the World's working poor who are honestly trying to make a living for themselves and their families. Funding is very important as they work towards economic independence.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Insurance Accounting Analyst (F.C.I.P.) I am married. My wife's name is Shirley and daughter is Suzanne

lender.name: Jennie
lender.occupational_info: When I can't find words, I create something that will speak for me.

lender.name: Uncle Bo
lender.loan_because: It reminds me of how necessary and easy it is to make a positive difference in the world. Kiva makes doing good attainable, rewarding and affordable.

lender.name: Jordan & Serena Joy
lender.loan_because: We want to pass the Blessings on...
lender.occupational_info: Jordan is in the business of making movies and Serena is a college student.

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: I can help others who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am retired public health nurse .I used to work in a district clinic in the Cayman islands in the caribbean.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the value of all kinds of people and different ways of knowing the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an ethnobotanist, studying how people use, think about and know plants.

lender.name: Syd
lender.loan_because: I like helping people.

lender.name: Cook Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in perpetual entrepreneurism and helping people help themselves.

lender.name: rene
lender.loan_because: It lets me share my wealth with someone who is in need of it. ( and it was a x-miss present from my girlfreind)
lender.occupational_info: I work in a paper-mill . where i am responsible for keeping the machines running.

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: it's an effortless way of creating opportunities for others in need around the world..
lender.occupational_info: A full-time history student, aspiring to become a teacher..working part-time at a cultural centre and a lottery that supports good causes..

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: Because I want to be active in spreading God's love to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher but I continue to teach the Bible to older women in my church.

lender.name: VALPO-SIFE
lender.loan_because: VALPO-SIFE strives to make a difference. Changing lives is what we live for!!!!

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in a wealthy nation and able to utilize the advantages this provided me. Kiva is a way for me to give back and perhaps in a small way help ease world tensions between have and have not countries.
lender.occupational_info: I help victims of all kinds of abuse deal with their past issues. I also study how people learn. I explain my findings to the person, the person's teachers, friends and family, so that the person's support system can better help them.

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.occupation: Loving Life & Teaching little children big things
lender.loan_because: "Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.' - Leo Buscaglia

lender.name: scott
lender.loan_because: uncommon threads

lender.name: Patrick
lender.occupation: Health Project Coordinator - HIV Vaccine Research
lender.loan_because: my first KIVA gift certificate ($25.)was a Christmas present to me from my Secret Santa here at work. However, I choose to re-invest in Kiva for two reasons: 1. because my first 'loan' was 'repaid in full' thereby giving credibility to the Kiva loan system; and 2. because in my heart I believe if we all help one another to be successful in whatever it is we choose to do, and to the extent we as individuals are able, then the planet would soon become a happier and healthier place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I help to ensure that persons from this area are informed about, and take part in HIV vaccine research studies. These studies are conducted by the University of Rochester Medical Center and are sponsored by the U.S. National Institutes of Health. The goal is to find a vaccine that can prevent AIDS. However, this goal requires healthy men and women to get informed about the research process and to 'roll up their sleeves' to take part in this global research initiative. My role is to inform the general public here in Rochester NY that the study vaccines are 'synthetic' and that it is IMPOSSIBLE for participants to get HIV infection from the vaccines being tested. Our mission? A World Without AIDS.

lender.name: Naomi
lender.occupation: Eating and sleeping! (I am only 6 months old)
lender.loan_because: I hope to help make the world a better place. It can be if we all support each other.

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: for my grandkids to learn the value of reaching out to help.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do and I genuinely care about people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people in the Washington, DC area switch to a clean renewable energy source for their electricity needs.

lender.name: Joshua Leu
lender.loan_because: Change the world! Bring about the Kingdom of God.
lender.occupational_info: Pastor

lender.name: Emily and Kevin
lender.loan_because: It helps other people get out of poverty.

lender.name: Jennafer
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people the tools and resources to empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help a family foundation make grants to nonprofit organizations around the world.

lender.name: Ken & Brenda
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you just need somebody to believe in you.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I like to think it will help make someone's life better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in law school, but a full time wanderer.

lender.name: Bill and Barb
lender.loan_because: to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: It's simply what we should all do - Help one another.

lender.name: Bernhard
lender.loan_because: I believe that microlending has the potential to address most of the fundamental issues with traditional charitable giving.
lender.occupational_info: I work in marketing for a large technology company based in the US

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I see alot of excess in my business and the world, and seek ways to achieve balance for my peace of mind and the greater good. I hope to spread the good fortune I have been given.
lender.occupational_info: Coordination of equipment and various people to achieve successful parties and corporate events.

lender.name: DeeAnn
lender.loan_because: I like it.
lender.occupational_info: My work is with plants and people.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: I think it is important
lender.occupational_info: self employed as a house painter.

lender.name: Nick & Cameron
lender.loan_because: We like to help people when we can
lender.occupational_info: We are students...we read and study alot.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed to have so much abundance in my life and believe that I need to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Helping communities manage their population and household growth in order to create healthy, vibrant, desirable places to live, work, and enjoy family life.

lender.name: LeeZu Baxter
lender.loan_because: We believe strongly in the power of direct aid to improve peoples lives. We have seen in our own lives the frustration of dealing with large impersonal organizations. Micro loans work!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I just want to help others that I can help.

lender.name: Friends of Joe
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do until joining Peace Corps in my retirement
lender.occupational_info: Facilitate communications between different stake holders

lender.name: Fay
lender.loan_because: I would like to be a blessing to someone else for all that has been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am the liason between the construction guys who build the homes and the home owners who have bought them.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur, and I would like to help others enjoy the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct all kinds of technology projects for clients in the US, and work with people from Russia too. It's a small world!

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: These businesses need a helping hand, not a hand out. They just need a bit of a break and they will do wonders. Where else can such a small bit of faith in the human condition make such a difference?
lender.occupational_info: I am a geologist by schooling and have spent a number of years wandering the earth looking for gold, tungsten and uranium. Now I assemble groups of talented individuals, attract capital and watch the magic when good ideas, good people and a little capital all come together.

lender.name: Russ
lender.loan_because: Poverty breeds revolution.
lender.occupational_info: I program mainframe computers and provide support to other programmers.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: This is the way we now give meaningful gifts and enriching others lives rather than gift giving to family that already has more than they need!

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate live happier lives.

lender.name: Rindert
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Dutch Postcode Lottery. It has been raising funds to support organizations working for a fairer, greener world. Fifty percent of its income goes to charity. The lottery has grown to become the Netherlands' biggest charity lottery and supports 64 charitable organizations. Since its founding, the lottery has dispensed more than 2.7 billion euros to its beneficiaries.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I loan because, now I can. In the past I have experienced financial/personal distress. I will always remember the strength I derived from a gesture of kindness or help. The benefit goes way beyond the dollar value of the loan. And I benefit, too.
lender.occupational_info: I reproduce fantastic works of art created by others in digital print form. These are large beautiful Gicl√©es on canvas and paper. Also a freelance support/tutor/consultant/fix-it Mac and Photoshop gal. And finally, I enjoy photographing the world around me. Sometimes a photograph is produced, and often the photo becomes a digital darkroom creation.

lender.name: Steve & Mary
lender.occupational_info: We work at living the best way we can for us and this world. We fail everyday and wake up and try it again. I hope we're getting better at it.

lender.name: Don & Rebecca
lender.loan_because: to offer a hand up to those who just need a little support to get started towards a better life, to promote self reliance and the competitive business spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I am a commercial construction company partner specializing in medical clinic construction and tenant improvements projects

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life, give them a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I source and buy home decor items in India and China and sell them across Canada and the USA.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: everybody who can help somebody should help somebody... there are folks out there that need that little help to get onto their feet. Not just a hand out but a chance to prove themselves, develop their own self-confidence. Too many people don't get that and I think KIVA is an amazing idea.

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: I see the world as a community where each of us has the opportunity to help each other. Micro loans are an excellent way to help people in emerging economies around the world have a better life. This benefits us all.
lender.occupational_info: I lead bus tours in the Western United States and travel frequently for work and pleasure.

lender.name: Isaiah
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Tom Allen, a U.S. Senate Candidate from the great State of Maine.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I am a believer in the microfinance concept and want to help people start or grow their businesses as I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed and run a home-based business selling a software product to local governments.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I don't have a lot of money, but I still want to be able to make a difference.

lender.name: Darryl
lender.loan_because: investing in people produces incredible returns!
lender.occupational_info: Families entrust their savings to me. I invest their money in stocks or mutual funds. My job is to make their money work hard or them.

lender.name: Cyryna
lender.loan_because: I want to see my money go where it could be very useful. Instead of buying me unnecessary things like name brand clothes, name brand handbags, etc.
lender.occupational_info:
I am currently persuing a Bachelor's Degree in Global Business Management as a full time college student.
I currently work part-time as an Assistant Manager at a toy store.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: one more hand doing something useful means one less hand shooting something at me
lender.occupational_info: I blow up things

lender.name: Kerry & Tim
lender.loan_because: We all have an obligation to help each other when we can. It's also a wonderful gift to be able to enable a dream.
lender.occupational_info: We work in aerospace engineering - helping to connect the world through air travel.

lender.name: Erika
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to make such a change in another person's life! I'm grateful to be able to share the abundance in my life with others.

lender.name: The Bridge
lender.loan_because: But if anyone has the world's goods and sees his brother in need, yet closes his heart against him, how does God's love abide in him? Little children, let us not love in word or talk but in deed and in truth. (1John 3:17-18)

lender.name: KEYA
lender.loan_because: ...micro lending works and reminds all people that a new opportunity is created every minute.

lender.name: Jake, Stef, Max, Peter
lender.loan_because: We believe in Microcredit. We have been to Guatemala and seen what a positive impact Micro Credit has had on the people there.
lender.occupational_info: Our family business provides insurance to protect people who have homes, cars, and businesses from disasters that would hurt their ability to keep what they have and do what they do.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I have enough - it's time we gave back.

lender.name: jon
lender.loan_because: I want to assist people to empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I founded and operate a growing health food company based in Adelaide Australia. Jama Enterprises manufactures propolis lozenges and non - aluminium anti perspirants and additionally imports manuka honey from NZ. Jama sell throughout Australia and NZ and are currently expanding into Sth Africa and Peru

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.occupational_info: I help inventors protect their inventions by obtaining patents for them.

lender.name: Goldrich Enterprises
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.

lender.name: keerthy
lender.loan_because: this seemingly small act put together with so many others.. empowers someone out there to be self-sustained.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: God says "You shall love your neighbor as yourself" as a Christian in today's world with the internet, everyone in the world is my neighbor!
lender.occupational_info: I write code for computers to build things like web sites and the programs that run on the computer.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: This is a more direct and personal way of helping those in need who are willing to work their way out of difficult circumstances.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: microfinance rocks.
lender.occupational_info: I help kids learn to love reading by picking out the most exciting books in the world.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is everyone's business.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to honor my parents who have always been willing to help out others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Web department for a non-profit that funds cancer research.

lender.name: Dorothy
lender.occupation: Mother, wildlife ecologist, and PhD student
lender.loan_because: I have enough to share with others and want to make someone else's life easier and better.

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupation: Assistant to the Head of School

lender.name: The Crowell Family
lender.loan_because: I believe it‚Äôs important to teach my children that if you can lend a hand you should. And with this program we can directly see how the process works.
lender.occupational_info: Mother of 2 boys

lender.name: Alberto
lender.loan_because: I want to help developing countries and I like to push the entrepreneurs, Kiva let me a fantastic way to achieve both
lender.occupational_info: Spanish Franchise Market Supplier

lender.name: BRYAN AND HOLLY
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people who are willing to work but have few opportunities to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: Bryan is a very talented musician, producer, and songwriter and Holly helps people by talking with them and giving them a place to bring their pain and tribulations.

lender.name: Dora
lender.loan_because: to be able to give ...is a gift in it self...

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do! I'm grateful for all those who have been there for me and want to be there for someon else in need.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of monies that go in and out of the bank for my employer. He owns properties that people rent to run their business. We receive their rent and pay vendors for electricity, gas, telephones, repairs and taxes. Whatever is left over is considered profit. It's tough right now as many tenants are having to close their doors & I feel bad for them. Many of them have become my friends and they are struggling.

lender.name: Bresden
lender.loan_because: People who have the ability to help have a responsibility to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to 13 and 15 year olds.

lender.name: Kitaho
lender.occupational_info: my work is about self efficacy, helping individuals and families identify & utilize their strengths.

lender.name: Juha
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: A thoughtful gift from a friend got me started, and helping others is what we all do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children sciency things.

lender.name: heather
lender.loan_because: it is important to share and give to others who can't afford the necessities of everyday life or to give to those who need to improve what they have.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to make someone's day a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I study numbers, and I work on projects to improve various business processes.

lender.name: Arie
lender.loan_because: this is a very direct and inspiring way to help other people
lender.occupational_info: My work involves helping people and organizations to come to grips with the new ways of working that are prompted by the ever-growing globalization of the world's economy.

lender.name: renee
lender.loan_because: "one person can make a difference..."
lender.occupational_info: jewellery designer

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: People who can help, should help! I want everyone to have a fair chance at a good life
lender.occupational_info: I create ways for doctors to share information with each other on the Internet.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I believe that so many around the world could make better lives for themselves if they just had a little boost up to get them started.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare tax returns to pay the bills and rescue cats to feed my soul.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to. I believe in empowering people who want a hand up, not just a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Vice President of Marketing and Technology

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: to improve the quality of lives.
lender.occupational_info: Information Technology is challenging, but stressful. I prefer sitting around playing fat notes on my Gibson SG guitar.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I was very poor as a child.

lender.name: Duc

lender.name: AustinGiving
lender.loan_because: My co-workers and I choose to give as an act of gratitude for the opportunities and blessings we have been given.
lender.occupational_info: We write software that helps insurance companies run their business.
